comment._content: That is the last German emporer "Kaiser Wilhem II." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wilhelm_II,_German_Emperor son of Friedrich III. and grandson of Wilhem I. House of Hohenzollern: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/House_of_Hohenzollern
